item.title: Check for custom objects in Python set.
item.description: Python set data structure is commonly used for removing duplicate entriesand make lookup faster (O(1)). Any hashable object can be stored in set.For example, list and dict canâ€™t be stored. User defined objects can be stored. Here is how it looks. class Person(object): def __init__(self, name, age): self.name, self.age = name, age In [25]: s = set() In [26]: s.add(Person('kracekumar', 25)) In [27]: s Out[27]: set([<__main__.Person at 0x1033c5e10>]) In [29]: Person('kracekumar', 25) in s Out[29]: False Implement equality check Even though Person object with same value is present but check failed.
